    • Method Detail

      • none

        public SpacingBuilder none()

      • spaceIf

        public SpacingBuilder spaceIf(boolean option)

      • spaceIf

        public SpacingBuilder spaceIf(boolean option,
                              boolean useParentDependentLFSpacing)
        If useParentDependentLFSpacing is true and parent block spans multiple lines, insert single line break. Otherwise insert whitespace block with exactly one or no spaces depending on value of option parameter.
        See Also:
        Spacing.createDependentLFSpacing(int, int, com.intellij.openapi.util.TextRange, boolean, int)

      • spaces

        public SpacingBuilder spaces(int count)

      • spaces

        public SpacingBuilder spaces(int count,
                             boolean useParentDependentLFSpacing)
        If useParentDependentLFSpacing is true and parent block spans multiple lines, insert single line break. Otherwise insert whitespace block that contains as many spaces as specified via count parameter.
        See Also:
        Spacing.createDependentLFSpacing(int, int, com.intellij.openapi.util.TextRange, boolean, int)

      • blankLines

        public SpacingBuilder blankLines(int count)

      • lineBreakInCodeIf

                              int maxSpaces,

                              int keepBlankLines)

      • parentDependentLFSpacing

        public SpacingBuilder parentDependentLFSpacing(int minSpaces,
                                               int maxSpaces,
                                               boolean keepLineBreaks,
                                               int keepBlankLines)
        Similar to spacing(int, int, int, boolean, int) but replaced by single line break, if parent block spans multiple lines.
        See Also:
        Spacing.createDependentLFSpacing(int, int, com.intellij.openapi.util.TextRange, boolean, int)
